metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9941 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Heap-based buffer overflow in rfbproto.c in LibVNCClient in LibVNCServerbefore 0.9.11 allows remote servers to cause a denial of service(application crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via a craftedFramebufferUpdate message containing a subrectangle outside of the clientdrawing area.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9941` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvncclient1 - 0.9.10+dfsg-3ubuntu0.16.04.1
libvncserver-config - 0.9.10+dfsg-3ubuntu0.16.04.1
libvncserver1 - 0.9.10+dfsg-3ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

italc-client - 1:2.0.2+dfsg1-4ubuntu0.1
italc-management-console - 1:2.0.2+dfsg1-4ubuntu0.1
italc-master - 1:2.0.2+dfsg1-4ubuntu0.1
libitalccore - 1:2.0.2+dfsg1-4ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libvncserver package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.9.10+dfsg-3ubuntu0.16.04.1').
italc package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2.0.2+dfsg1-4ubuntu0.1').
